text: Arhopala alexandrae is a butterfly in the family Lycaenidae. It was described by Schröder & Treadaway in 1978. It is endemic to the Philippines (Bohol, Mindano, Panay, Luzon, and Marinduque) in the Indomalayan realm.Seitz, A., 1912-1927. Die Indo-Australien Tagfalter Grossschmetterlinge Erde 9Schröder, H, & Treadaway, C.G 1978 1978. Neue lepidopteren von den Philippinen, 3. Entomologische Zeitschrift 88(14): 149-161, 6 figs. ==References== ==External links== *Arhopala Boisduval, 1832 at Markku Savela's Lepidoptera and Some Other Life Forms. Retrieved June 3, 2017. title: Arhopala alexandrae
